title: Greek National Water Company - Water Management System - CrossSection
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic cross-section made for raw-water supply management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water management vertical and related IoT applications. Act as computation point

measuredFrom.description: Description of relevant position of a cross section from a reference point

flow.description: Rate of flow in the cross-section

quality.description: Quality parameter (temperature, turbidity, conductivity) in the cross-section

energyHead.description: the energy head in the cross-section

CrossSectionGeometry.description: Description of the geometry of a cross-section. Text defining the geometry of a channel. Values restricted to 'Trapezoidal' (for open channels) or 'Circular' (for pressurized flow) or 'Irregular'

copiesFrom.description: URI of a Channel component from which the value of a property is obtained

attachedTo.description: A relationship to the ID of the channel where the cross-section “lives in”. Reference to an entity of type Channel

measuredFrom.description: A sub-Relationship to the ID of a node (e.g., Junction, Sluice gate, Reservoir) from which the relevant position of the cross section is measured
